satisfaction.description: The satisfaction level of the customer with the airline service

value_dict.satisfied: The customer is satisfied with the airline service
value_dict.dissatisfied: The customer is dissatisfied with the airline service

value_dict.Loyal Customer: The customer is loyal to the airline
value_dict.disloyal Customer: The customer is not loyal to the airline

value_dict.Personal Travel: The travel is for personal reasons
value_dict.Business travel: The travel is for business reasons

value_dict.Eco: The customer traveled in economy class
value_dict.Business: The customer traveled in business class
value_dict.Eco Plus: The customer traveled in economy plus class

Departure/Arrival time convenient.description: Rating of the convenience of departure/arrival time

Food and drink.description: Rating of the food and drink

Inflight wifi service.description: Rating of the inflight wifi service

Ease of Online booking.description: Rating of the ease of online booking

Leg room service.description: Rating of the leg room service

Departure Delay in Minutes.description: Duration of departure delay in minutes

Arrival Delay in Minutes.description: Duration of arrival delay in minutes

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in customer satisfaction analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer and their experience with the airline, please predict the customer satisfaction.

class_value_dict.satisfied: The customer is satisfied with the airline service
